description:
A great alternative to DEET-based repellents, this is a long-lasting, botanical based formula that protects for up to 6 hours.

  • DEET-free formula
  • 37ml pump spray
  • Active ingredient is 30% plant based Citriodiol, derived from lemon eucalyptus trees
name: Natrapel Insect Repellent Pump Spray 37ml
